description:
Fortnite is an ever-evolving multiplayer game where players battle,
build, and outlast their opponents in a vibrant, dynamic world.
Whether you're playing solo or teaming up with friends, every match
is a new chance to show your skills and creativity.
name: Fortnite
title: Join the Ultimate Survival

description:
The Last of Us Part II continues the emotional journey of Ellie as
she navigates a devastated world filled with danger, loss, and
unforgettable moments. With stunning visuals and deep storytelling,
it sets a new bar for narrative-driven games.
name: The Last of Us Part II
title: Survive the Aftermath

description:
Step into the shoes of Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter for hire,
and explore a vast, richly detailed fantasy world. The Witcher 3:
Wild Hunt delivers a gripping story, complex characters, and moral
choices that truly impact the game's world.
name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
title: Hunt the Wild

description:
Feel the adrenaline as you race through city streets, evade cops,
and customize your dream car. Need for Speed: Heat blends arcade
racing with narrative and a vivid open world for both day and night
racing challenges.
name: Need for Speed: Heat
title: Drive to Win

description:
Join a team of extraordinary heroes and use unique powers to
battle opponents across global arenas. Overwatch 2 brings new
characters, cooperative modes, and updated graphics to an already
beloved competitive shooter franchise.
name: Overwatch 2
title: Assemble Your Heroes

description:
Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord offers a sprawling medieval sandbox
where players can forge empires, command armies, and engage in
brutal, real-time combat. Diplomacy, trade, and strategy add layers
of depth to the experience.
name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord
title: Lead Armies, Forge Kingdoms

description:
Enter the world of Azeroth, where heroes rise to face ancient
evils and forge legendary alliances. World of Warcraft continues to
evolve with massive expansions, deep lore, and a vibrant community
of players worldwide.
name: World of Warcraft
title: Adventure Awaits in Azeroth

description:
Little Nightmares II immerses players in a suspenseful journey
through hauntingly beautiful environments. Solve puzzles, avoid
monsters, and uncover the dark secrets that lie just beneath the
surface.
name: Little Nightmares II
title: Escape the Nightmares

description:
Minecraft offers a sandbox experience like no other. Build,
explore, craft, and survive in a world limited only by your
imagination. Play solo or with friends and create your own
adventure, one block at a time.
name: Minecraft
title: Build Your World

description:
Live the myth as a legendary Spartan warrior and shape history
through choices that matter. Assassinâ€™s Creed Odyssey blends
historical exploration, brutal combat, and branching narratives into
a breathtaking epic set in Ancient Greece.
name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
title: Live the Legend
